Source code for ted17.w_integer_spin

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

import PyQt5.QtWidgets as Qw
import PyQt5.QtCore as Qc



[docs]class Integer_spin(Qw.QSpinBox):
    '''
    Integer values (eg 123)
    '''
    def __init__(self, val=0, parent=None):
        super().__init__(parent)
        self.set(val)
        self.setMinimum(0)
        self.setMaximum(999999999)
        self.setAlignment(Qc.Qt.AlignRight |
                          Qc.Qt.AlignTrailing |
                          Qc.Qt.AlignVCenter)
        self.setButtonSymbols(Qw.QAbstractSpinBox.NoButtons)


[docs]    def get(self):
        return self.value()



[docs]    def set(self, val):
        if val:
            self.setValue(int(val))
        else:
            self.setValue(0)
